document.heading: Ballpark Omnibus Financing and Revenue Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-320, the “Ballpark Omnibus Financing and Revenue Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-1028, which was referred to the Committee of Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 30, 2004, and December 21, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-717 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-320 became effective on April 8, 2005.
